Package it.polimi.se2018.controller.network

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbsMatchReq
    Represents a logic request concerning a match
    AbsReq
    Represents a generic request/response that is being sent between client and server
    AbsReqServerComm
    Represents the subset of the AbsReq that concern network operations
    AbsReqServerLogic
    Represents the subset of the AbsReq that concern logic operations
    ChangeCLayerRequest
    A request to change network technology
    ChatMessageRequest
    Request that is used to send a chat message through the network
    ClientRequest
    A request that is used to wrap a serializable object sent from the controller over the request channel
    GetLeaderBoardRequest
    Request for the update of the leaderboard
    KeepAliveRequest
    A request used as a timely keep-alive
    KickRequest
    A request used to kick someone/notify that someone has been kicked
    LeaveMatchRequest
    Request to leave a match/notify that someone has left
    ListUsersRequest
    Request for the update of the logged users list
    LogoutRequest
    A request used to logout/notify a logout
    MatchAbortedRequest
    Request used to abort/notify that a match has been aborted
    MatchBeginRequest
    Request used to notify clients that a match is starting
    MatchEndedRequest
    Request used to notify that a match has ended and to transmit the results
    MatchInviteRequest
    Request used to invite players to a match
    MatchmakingRequest
    Request used to join or leave matchmaking
    MatchResponseRequest
    Request used to answer to an invite
    TerminationReq
    Request the termination of the network layer/notifies the successful termination
    ThreadHandler
    A wrapper for a generic Thread Handler that calls a method until stopped
    ThreadHandlerTest  
    UserReconnectedRequest
    Notifies that a user has reconnected
